# SRWristDetection.CrownOrientation.right

**Case**

Indicates that the Digital Crown faces to the right with respect to the wearer.

## Declaration

```swift
case right
```

## Orientations

- **SRWristDetection.CrownOrientation.left**: Indicates that the Digital Crown faces to the left with respect to the wearer.

items.description: Indicates that the Digital Crown faces to the left with respect to the wearer.
items.name: SRWristDetection.CrownOrientation.left
